## hpr0888 :: EMACS Help Sources

 
In today's show we get proof that Klaatu lured another over to the dark side. So much so that JWP has gathered some resources for you on where you can get help on EMACS they are all on his site at https://jwp1.weeman.org/



links

https://www.rgrjr.com/emacs/emacs_cheat.html

https://ccrma.stanford.edu/guides/package/emacs/emacs.html

https://abdallah.hiof.no/dmpro/intro-2008/emacs-cheat-sheet.pdf

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PldhTEu1VRo

https://xahlee.org/emacs/emacs.html

https://cmgm.stanford.edu/classes/unix/emacs.html

https://www.astrohandbook.com/ch20/emacs.pdf
